titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Laura Pollan.
A resolution honoring the life and legacy of Laura Pollan.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Kerry without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 321.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes and honors Laura Pollan for her peaceful struggle to bring human rights and democracy to Cuba.
Offers condolences to her family, friends, and loved ones.
Expresses hope that in memory of Laura Pollan, peaceful dissidents in Cuba will no longer be incarcerated or subjected to human-rights abuses.
